title: Effectiveness and mechanism of the Chinese medicine Weiren Xiaoyou formula in improving palmoplantar warts
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Xin Liu, Ruofan Xi, Linyan Cheng, Yi Wang, Yiwen Nie, Ge Yan, Dongjie Guo, Wanjun Guo, Ting Du, Hanzhi Lu, Peiyao Wang, Jianyong Zhu, Fulun Li
